name: KATABOLT Export Consultant
overview:
KATABOLT provides New Zealand entrepreneurs with professional advice in targeting offshore markets. This business is a collaborative effort between The ICEHOUSE and entrepreneur Christopher Boys focused on opening up the global marketplace to New Zealand businesses. Over the last 10 years it has worked to build a worldwide network and has gained international recognition as one of the world’s top incubators.

KATABOLT is dedicated on helping others succeed and focused on expanding businesses internationally to increase their profit and fulfil their potential. KATABOLT understands that each company needs are different and approach each business plan accordingly. They take each client through a 5 step process to ensure they achieve their global goals. In the first step of this process they meet with the client to get a personal perspective of what their overall objectives and aspirations are. They then evaluate which KATABOLT services would best suit the client’s business objectives and propose a plan to develop a specifically tailored export strategy.

KATABOLT specialists work hard to implement the strategy through a number of different of tactics. They know that first impressions count as much as the follow through and guarantee their customer’s business will be introduced with objective to make strong lasting international connections.
